changePassword1.headline: Change password or email address
changePassword1.intro: You use the MINT-ID and can therefore only change your email address and password at <0>mint-id.org</0>.

changePassword2.headline: Change password
changePassword2.intro: Here you can change your password. It must be at least 8 characters long. Use numbers and symbols to make it more secure.
